verses.name: Deuteronomy 23:4
verses.text: Because they met you not with bread and with water in the way, when ye came forth out of Egypt; and because they hired against thee Balaam the son of Beor of Pethor of Mesopotamia, to curse thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 23:5
verses.text: Nevertheless the Lord thy God would not hearken unto Balaam; but the Lord thy God turned the curse into a blessing unto thee, because the Lord thy God loved thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 23:6
verses.text: Thou shalt not seek their peace nor their prosperity all thy days for ever.
